column1: Kata Robata////-- Miso Lobster Mac n' Cheese: YOU GUYZZZ
column2: you were so right. This dish has been praised a hundred times over by Yelpers and I whole-heartedly agree. It's rich and velvety
column4: and there are chunks upon chunks of sweet lobster meat. My man is usually a gentleman when it comes to letting me have the last bite
column6: we were having ourselves a good ol' fashioned stare-down.
